title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Featured on the DIY Network hit show, “House Crashers”

content.rendered: Ahmed Hassan, landscape expert and host of the DIY network hit show, “Yard Crashers,” looks for fresh and unique products to help homeowners transform their yards. So it’s no surprise that Hassan choose Eldorado Stone to transform a weathered shed into a rustic and entertaining “Snack Shack” featuring Russet Mountain Ledge Panels and Buckskin accents as well as a beautiful firepit! The Eldorado Stone products helped the “Yard Crashers” team transform the unappealing lawn into a beautiful and polished yard!

excerpt.rendered: Ahmed Hassan, landscape expert and host of the DIY network hit show, “Yard Crashers,” looks for fresh and unique products to help homeowners transform their yards. So it’s no surprise that Hassan choose Eldorado Stone to transform a weathered shed into a rustic and entertaining “Snack Shack” featuring Russet Mountain Ledge Panels and Buckskin accents […]
